squidpony.squidgrid.gui.swing.animation.AnimationManager

  • Packages that use AnimationManager 
    Package Description
    squidpony.squidgrid.gui.swing.animation  

    • Uses of AnimationManager in squidpony.squidgrid.gui.swing.animation

      Methods in squidpony.squidgrid.gui.swing.animation that return AnimationManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AnimationManager AnimationManager.startNewAnimationManager(javax.swing.JComponent component)
      Creates a new AnimationManager that will draw to the provided image and then starts it in a daemon worker thread to manage the animations.
